resources.string:
Answers

Just type in a fraction from the name of the app you want to launch in the top. Click the app to start or long click the app for more options. If you have a phone with Android Jelly Bean (or newer), you can also use the Google Now gesture to start this app. To find out how much faster you got with this app you could try Applaunch-O-Meter which is also available for free.

Questions

You can ask in the community or drop the author an Email. Also contact me if you can and want to translate this app - it\'s not much text at all.

Credits

Thanks to talexop and Peter Serwylo for pull-requests!
